block.p: GURMAN-Sally. On January 25, 1998. The wife of the late Joseph and dear mother of the late Eugene. Also loving mother of Evelyn Altman. Dear grandmother of Dr. Robin Altman, Andrew Altman, Elylm Gurman Altman and Gary Prish. Devoted great grandmother of Evan Joseph and Clara Alexis Prish. Family said, ''She was a great fighter''. Funeral services were held privately Monday at United Hebrew Cemetery.
